verses.verse: And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> he, and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had, and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with him, into the <S%H5045>south.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>rich<s%> in <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> on his <S%H4550>journeys<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> even to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Hai;<s%>

To the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> at the <S%H7223>first:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> was not <S%H5375>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> them, that they might <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> for their <S%H7399>substance<s%> was <S%H7227>great,<s%> so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And there was a <S%H7379>strife<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot's<s%> <S%H4735>cattle:<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> Let there be <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4808>strife,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, and <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> and your <S%H7462>herdsmen;<s%> for we be <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

Is not the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you? <S%H6504>separate<s%> yourself, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, from me: <S%H518>if<s%> you will take the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8041>hand,<s%> then I will go to the <S%H3231>right;<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> you depart to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> then I will go to the <S%H8041>left.<s%>

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that it was well <S%H4945>watered<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> where, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> even as the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> like the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

Then <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H6924>east:<s%> and they <S%H6504>separated<s%> themselves the <S%H376>one<s%> from the <S%H251>other.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and <S%H167>pitched<s%> his <S%H167>tent<s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom.<s%>
But the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> were <S%H7451>wicked<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H3876>Lot<s%> was <S%H6504>separated<s%> from him, <S%H5375>Lift<s%> up now your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H5045>southward,<s%> and <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> and <S%H3220>westward:<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>see,<s%> to you will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> that <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H4487>number<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> then shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of it and in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it; for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you.

Then <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H167>removed<s%> his <S%H167>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> which is in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
